hero_subtitle:
Leading the way in specialized dental education and global AI-powered tools
Where science, art, and technology unite to create perfect smiles
intro_title: What is Rom and where are we headed?
intro_desc: We are a leading platform in dentistry, delivering world-class educational courses and AI-based professional tools to the global dental community.
intro_p1: With full energy and focus, we are building the best educational and innovative tool experience for dentists and specialists worldwide.
intro_p2: Beyond education and professional tools, we have a greater goal: developing dedicated AI tools that make diagnosis, treatment, and clinic management more accurate and efficient on a global scale.
intro_p3: To achieve this, we need AI specialists, machine learning experts, medical image processing professionals, and creative developers from around the world.
intro_p4: If you are passionate about technology, innovation, and dentistry, Rom is the place for you – with no geographical boundaries.
story_title: A story that began with a global dream...
story_p1: A group of dentists and tech specialists who believed dental education and tools should meet global standards decided to build a platform that provides this access to everyone.
story_quote: Why shouldn't dentists worldwide have access to the best education and most advanced tools?
story_p2: And thus Rom was born – with a global vision.
story_p3: We are at the beginning of our journey, but with full commitment to world-class quality, continuous innovation, and real impact in dentistry.
